elements.name: question1
elements.html:
Code.org Self-paced Online Professional Learning

Welcome to the program!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org and our Regional Partners for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

Progam Pre-Survey

elements.name: main_goal
elements.title: My main goal for this professional learning is to:

choices.text: Better understand the CS Discoveries curriculum
Learn the basics of computer programming
Learn best strategies for teaching computer science

elements.name: reason_for_selfpaced
elements.title: My main reason for choosing self-paced professional development, as opposed to facilitator-led professional development, is:

choices.text: I did not know that there was facilitator-led Code.org professional development
Facilitator-led Code.org professional development is not available in my region
I do not have time to go to an facilitator-led workshop
A facilitator-led workshop feels like more than I need
I am not eligible to go to a facilitator-led workshop (e.g. I am not a teacher)
I have been to a facilitator-led workshop, but I want more support

elements.name: plan_to_teach_csd
elements.title: Are you planning to teach CS Discoveries?

elements.name: interest_learning_cs
elements.title: How interested are you in *learning* computer science?

elements.name: interest_teaching_cs
elements.title: How interested are you in teaching computer science?

elements.name: confidence_to_teache
elements.title: How confident do you feel in your ability to teach computer science effectively right now?

elements.name: how_nessessary_to_learn
elements.title: How necessary is it for students to learn computer science?

elements.name: current_level_cs_knowledge
elements.title: Which best describes your current level of knowledge about computer science?

choices.text: I have done a few activities/games online (e.g. the Hour of Code)
I have taken a few courses in computer science (e.g. online classes, college courses)
I have attended facilitator-led professional development to teach computer science
I have a degree in computer science (e.g. an undergraduate or graduate degree)
Out-of-school educator (e.g. tutor, after school teacher)

elements.name: race_eth
elements.title: Which of the following best represents your racial or ethnic background? Please select all that apply. (optional)

choices.text: Racial or ethnic background not listed
